Legislative History of Laws

Uniform Law:

This section is based on ยง 301 of the Uniform Limited Company Act (2006 Act). See Vol. 6B , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE ยง 29-803.01

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: A member shall not be an agent of a limited liability company solely by reason of being a member.
A person's status as a member shall not prevent or restrict law other than this chapter from imposing liability on a limited liability company because of the person's conduct.

subchapter.text: Relations of Members and Managers to Persons Dealing with Limited Liability Company.

heading.catch_text: No agency power of member as member.
